name: Lucent (POST JAM version)
description:
This is a fixed version of the game made in less than 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. You can play and rate the original here.

Controls: Arrow keys to move. Ctrl key to reset the current puzzle, but only when you are in darkness (frozen).

Follow our newsletter and get a free extra level for our other game, TENANT: https://croxel-studios.com/newsletter

Credits:

  • Pablo Moreno (@HypercubeCore):  Level design & VFX
  • Alberto Navarro (@forameuss): Music & SFX
  • Luis Gutiérrez (@Lwyx): Programming

Social media: Twitter – Instagram – Facebook – Website
